meanings.definition: A cooking stove on a ship.
meanings.sent1: The sailors gathered around the camboose to warm up.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared a delicious meal on the camboose.
meanings.sent3: The camboose crackled with warmth as the storm raged outside.
meanings.sent4: The camboose was the heart of the ship, providing comfort and sustenance.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of stew bubbling on the camboose filled the air.

meanings.sent1: She camboosed a hearty breakfast for the crew.
meanings.sent2: They camboosed fresh fish for dinner.
meanings.sent3: He camboosed up a storm in the tiny kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The chef camboosed with skill and precision.
meanings.sent5: Camboosing requires patience and attention to detail.

meanings.sent1: The pots and pans clanged in the busy camboose.
meanings.sent2: The cook hurried back and forth in the cramped camboose.
meanings.sent3: The mice on the ship held a secret meeting in the camboose.
meanings.sent4: The camboose was always filled with the comforting smell of food.
meanings.sent5: In the camboose, delicious meals were crafted for the hungry crew.
